title: Expo iOS Build executor
description: Build and sign a standalone IPA for the Apple App Store

clearCredentials.description: Clear all credentials stored on Expo servers.

clearDistCert.description: Remove Distribution Certificate stored on Expo servers.

clearPushKey.description: Remove Push Notifications Key stored on Expo servers.

clearPushCert.description: Remove Push Notifications Certificate stored on Expo servers. Use of Push Notifications Certificates is deprecated.

clearProvisioningProfile.description: Remove Provisioning Profile stored on Expo servers.

revokeCredentials.description: Revoke credentials on developer.apple.com, select appropriate using --clear-* options.

appleId.description: Apple ID username (please also set the Apple ID password as EXPO_APPLE_PASSWORD environment variable).

distP12Path.description: Path to your Distribution Certificate P12 (set password as EXPO_IOS_DIST_P12_PASSWORD environment variable).

pushP8Path.description: Path to your Push Key .p8 file.

publicUrl.description: The URL of an externally hosted manifest (for self-hosted apps).

skipWorkflowCheck.description: Skip warning about build service bare workflow limitations.

sync.description: Syncs npm dependencies to package.json (for React Native autolink). Always true when --install is used.
